title: Power cable maintenance on Circle Line

title_translations.ms: Penyelenggaraan kabel kuasa di Laluan Bulat

updates.text: [CCL]CLEARED:Train services between Caldecott&HollandVillage are now operating normally.http://t.co/ncAmAQI128
[CCL] Expect longer travel time (~15min) between Caldecott & HollandVillage stations due to power cable change. http://t.co/ncAmAQI128
